altTitles.en: I Want to Become the Empress Regnant, so I Need a Divorce
I Want to Become the Emperor, so I Need a Divorce

altTitles.es: Firmare el divorcio para ser la emperatriz

altTitles.zh: 离婚后，前夫的皇位归我了

altTitles.ja: 皇帝になるので離婚してください

description.en:
Born as an imperial princess, Arnoah was forced to marry the pathetic young king of a small neighboring kingdom. Her older brother became the emperor, so what was she supposed to do? And due to the laws of inheritance, even if her older brother and younger brother were to die, she would still not inherit the throne - rather, her good-for-nothing cheater of a husband would!! Any title she inherits would be vested in her husband in accordance to their marriage contract... that is, until he decides to divorce her because his mistress wants to be the official queen.

“I need to get divorced and become the emperor.”

Her now official ex-husband still doesn't seem to get it, so she decided to finally tell him everything she always wanted to say to his face. When he realized the truth, it was already too late. She spoke to her ex-husband who had his mouth agape.

“I told you to keep your head straight. Didn’t you hear me?”

---
Revenge is sweet. Divorce? Even sweeter.

Arnoa is trapped in a loveless marriage in which she has sacrificed both her heart and dignity. In the midst of such matrimonial misery, she receives the chance to claim the Empire as her own. There's just one catch: she needs a divorce to make it happen! Will she succeed in getting the last laugh?
description.es:
La venganza es dulce, pero el divorcio aún más.
Arnoa está atrapada en un matrimonio sin amor en el que ha sacrificado tanto su corazón como su dignidad. En medio de tanta miseria matrimonial, recibe la oportunidad de reclamar el imperio. Solo hay un inconveniente: ¡necesita el divorcio para que esto suceda! ¿Conseguirá ser la última en reír?
description.fr:
Arnoa, princesse impériale s’est vu forcée à épouser un pitoyable roi d’un pays voisin. Sous l’ordre de son frère, l’empereur avec qui elle entretient une relation conflictuelle.

«Je vous aime, Larissa.»

«Vous semblez si heureuse.»

Arnoa se moquait que son mari ait une liaison avec une prostituée ou non. La seule chose qu’elle attendait était la mort… Un jour, son frère aîné perdit la vie de manière inattendue. Dorénavant Arnoa a une raison de vivre: devenir l’impératrice du royaume. Comment va-t-elle faire pour se débarrasser de son mari? Et de quelle manière va-t-elle faire face aux différents obstacles qui vont se dresser devant elle?

---
Le divorce? Encore plus exquis que la vengeance.

Arnoa est prisonnière d'un mariage sans amour marqué par la trahison, la souffrance et l’humiliation. Un jour, la chance de pouvoir s’approprier l’empire et retrouver sa liberté s’offre à elle. Mais il y a un hic: elle doit divorcer pour pouvoir devenir Impératrice! Parviendra-t-elle à ses fins?
description.ko: "탑에 갇혀 자란 황제의 이복동생이자 황녀인 아르노아. 정략결혼으로 겨우 황제의 감시에서 벗어났다고 생각했지만. “나, 바이나스 로체 디르한은 그대와의 이혼을 선언한다.” 2년간의 짧고도 길었던 결혼 생활의 끝에 남겨진 건, 일방적인 이혼 뿐. “……분명하네. 이혼.” 꾹 다물렸던 아르노아의 입술이 열리고 조용한 목소리가 들려왔다. 모두들 그녀의 눈물을 기다렸지만, “이제라도 끝내 줘서 고마워. 2년 동안 정말 많이 참았거든.” 황제의 전령, 무시무시한 소문을 끌고 다니는 제국의 그 마탑주가 그녀의 말과 함께 나타나 누구도 예상치 못한 말을 하는데, “고개를 숙여라. 대륙의 새 주인, 아르노아 살리에드 카이시온 황제다.” 이혼을 위해 모인 자리에서 웃고 있는 것은 오직 그녀 뿐이었다."
description.pt-br: Nascida como a princesa imperial, Arnoa se casou com um rei patético de um território vizinho. Seu irmão mais velho, com quem ela não se dava bem, era o imperador. Ela não tinha escolha a não ser fazer o que mandavam. Mesmo que seu marido estivesse tendo um caso com as damas de companhia dela, ela não tinha o que fazer. Mas então, seu irmão mais velho e seu segundo irmão morreram, a próxima imperatriz seria a Arnoa…? Não, seria o marido inútil dela. Todos os títulos que ela herdasse enquanto estivesse casada, seriam concedidos ao seu marido. Ela não podia deixar isso acontecer nem morta, então ela se decidiu. “Eu me divorciarei e me tornarei a Imperatriz.”
description.zh: 受气包公主离婚后称帝，打脸渣男前夫+为了不回到疯批哥哥身边，公主在婚姻里忍下无数羞辱，最终丈夫还是抱着情妇，当众与她解除了婚姻。但婚后的她却成了皇位的唯一继承人？如愿看着本该成为皇帝的前夫跌坐在地，未来的女皇陛下露出了笑容。过去她受的苦难，该让这帮垃圾如数偿还了！
